settings.heading: A BEAUTIFUL YOU, INSIDE AND OUT
settings.title: Excess Fat
settings.body: There’s nothing more frustrating than working out and eating right only to have aspects of your body resist those efforts. When stubborn pockets of fat don’t respond, there is more you can do to get the physique you’ve always wanted. Balanced Aesthetics Medspa has two revolutionary treatments to sculpt away the fat and tone muscles for the body contour you desire.

settings.text: The customizable nature of both truSculpt® iD and truSculpt® flex makes each treatment suitable for most adult men and women. truSculpt® flex is more successful for men and women near their target weight. If the adipose layer covering the targeted muscles is too thick, a truSculpt® iD treatment before your series of truSculpt® flex procedures may produce more visible results. Get started on your body contouring treatment plan with a consultation at Balanced Aesthetics.

Both treatments are remarkable in how they bring about results. truSculpt® iD often requires only a single treatment to reduce your unwanted fat by up to 24%. If you wish to reduce your fat layer by more, another treatment or two can be scheduled to get you there. Your body will absorb and filter out these fat cells over the following few weeks, and you may see inches lost beginning in week 3. Your treatment area will continue to shrink for up to 12 weeks after treatment.

truSculpt® flex can produce up to 30% muscle mass increase, toning and shaping your muscles for increased strength. It may take 2 sessions before you’re able to see results, with maximum improvement peaking at 8-12 weeks. You’ll feel stronger and more toned for the physique you’ve always wanted.

settings.question: How Does Body Contouring Work?
settings.answer:
At Balanced Aesthetics, we have two body contouring treatments that produce real, measurable results, truSculpt iD® fat reduction and truSculpt® flex muscle toning.

truSculpt® iD uses monopolar radiofrequency (RF) technology to heat fat cells and disrupt their membranes. The body’s natural cellular filtering process absorbs the damaged cells and filters them through the lymphatic system. Studies have proven truSculpt® iD produces up to a 24% reduction of fat cells in the treated area after a single treatment. The RF energy has the added benefit of contracting cellular structures and improving collagen production, so as your fat cells are filtered away, your skin tightens and becomes firmer and more youthful. truSculpt® iD’s temperature control ensures safe, therapeutic heating levels of subcutaneous fat while maintaining comfortable surface temperatures. Now, you can shape your figure to reduce unwanted fat, so your clothes fit better, and you feel more confident in your own skin.

truSculpt® flex brings power and strength to your muscles through Multi-Directional Stimulation (MDS). Low levels of energy go deep into the muscles to create high-intensity contractions. With three modes to replicate crunches, squats, or twisting exercises, your truSculpt® flex treatment is tailored to your shape, fitness level, and overall goals. These contractions can achieve up to 30% muscle mass increase on average for a more toned, sculpted physique. Your muscles don’t just look stronger; they are stronger, allowing you to up the intensity of your exercise or weight lifting regimen for continued, long-term results.

settings.question: What is the Treatment Like?
settings.answer: Our truSculpt® iD clients report the therapy is incredibly relaxing, much like a hot stone massage. truSculpt® flex feels like muscle contractions that rise in intensity but remain comfortable throughout treatment. Both procedures are fast, depending on the size of the treatment area. If you’re having your abdomen or flanks treated, typical treatment ranges between 15-30 minutes to complete. For truSculpt® flex, we may recommend a series of up to 4 treatments to reach your contouring goals.

settings.question: Is There Any Downtime?
settings.answer: You may feel warm and flushed for a few hours after each procedure, and your treatment area may be mildly tender for a few days. After truSculpt® flex, you may feel as though you’ve had a really intense workout. But there’s no downtime otherwise.

settings.text: If the gym is no longer cutting it and you’re tired of not getting results, let Balanced Aesthetics Medspa help with truSculpt® iD and truSculpt® flex.
